titles.ar: باب كَرَاهِيَةِ أَكْلِ لَحْمِ الْغَرِيضِ يُعْنَى النِّي
titles.en: Chapter 63 – Abhorrence of eating the tender meat, meaning the raw

titles.ar: باب كَرَاهِيَةِ أَكْلِ لَحْمِ الْغَرِيضِ يُعْنَى النِّي
titles.en: Chapter 63 – Abhorrence of eating the tender meat, meaning the raw

gradings: Allamah Baqir al-Majlisi: حسن - Mir‘at al ‘Uqul Fi Sharh Akhbar Al al Rasul (2/136)

parts.text: أَبِي جَعْفَرٍ ( عليه السلام ) أَنَّ رَسُولَ اللَّهِ ( صلى الله عليه وآله ) نَهَى أَنْ يُؤْكَلَ اللَّحْمُ غَرِيضاً وَ

narrator_chain.text: عَلِيُّ بْنُ إِبْرَاهِيمَ عَنْ أَبِيهِ عَنْ حَمَّادِ بْنِ عِيسَى عَنْ حَرِيزٍ عَنْ زُرَارَةَ عَنْ أَبِي جَعْفَرٍ ( عليه السلام ) أَنَّ رَسُولَ اللَّهِ ( صلى الله عليه وآله ) نَهَى أَنْ يُؤْكَلَ اللَّحْمُ غَرِيضاً وَ قَالَ

text: إِنَّمَا تَأْكُلُهُ السِّبَاعُ وَ لَكِنْ حَتَّى تُغَيِّرَهُ الشَّمْسُ أَوِ النَّارُ .

en.hubeali: Ali Bin Ibrahim, from his father, from Hammad Bin Isa, from Hareyz, from Zurara,

(It has been narrated) from Abu Ja’far<sup>asws</sup> that Rasool-Allah<sup>saww</sup> forbade from eating the tender (raw) meat and said, ‘But rather, it is the wild animals which eat it, but (you can eat it) until after the sun has changed it, or the fire’.
en.sarwar: 1. Ali ibn Ibrahim has narrated from his father from Hammad ibn ‘Isa from Hariz from Zurarah who has said the following: “Abu Ja‘far, ‘Alayhi al-Salam, has said that the Messenger of Allah, O Allah, grant compensation to Muhammad and his family worthy of their services to Your cause, prohibited eating fresh (raw) meat and said that beasts eat fresh meat, thus it must be used for food only after it is changed by sun or fire.’”

gradings: Allamah Baqir al-Majlisi: صحيح - Mir‘at al ‘Uqul Fi Sharh Akhbar Al al Rasul (2/137)

narrator_chain.text: مُحَمَّدُ بْنُ يَحْيَى عَنْ أَحْمَدَ بْنِ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنْ عَلِيِّ بْنِ الْحَكَمِ عَنْ هِشَامِ بْنِ سَالِمٍ قَالَ

text: سَأَلْتُ أَبَا عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) عَنْ أَكْلِ لَحْمِ النِّي‏ءِ فَقَالَ هَذَا طَعَامُ السِّبَاعِ .

en.hubeali: Muhammad Bin Yahya, from Ahmad Bin Muhammad, from Ali Bin Al Hakam, from Hisham Bin Salim who said,
‘I asked Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup> about eating the raw meat, so he<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘This is a food of the wild animals’.
en.sarwar: 2. Muhammad ibn Yahya has narrated from Ahmad ibn Muhammad from Ali ibn al-Hakam from Hisham ibn Salim who has said the following: “I once asked abu ‘Abd Allah, Alayhi al-Salam, about eating fresh (raw) meat. He (the Imam) said, ‘It is the food of beasts.”’
